TestCase.name: testIntersect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[IS NOT DISTINCT FROM(c, f)], select=[c], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) : +- Calc(select=[c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f]]) +- Calc(select=[f]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testIntersectAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT ALL SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

Calc(select=[c0 AS c]) +- Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$planner$functions$tablefunctions$ReplicateRows$a5a5fb35ffda8b52251be55e3ceaee69($0, $1)], correlate=[table(ReplicateRows($f0,c))], select=[$f0,c,c0], rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT $f0, VARCHAR(2147483647) c, VARCHAR(2147483647) c0)], joinType=[INNER]) +- Calc(select=[IF((vcol_left_cnt > vcol_right_cnt), vcol_right_cnt, vcol_left_cnt) AS $f0, c], where=[((vcol_left_cnt >= 1) AND (vcol_right_cnt >= 1))]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, COUNT(vcol_left_marker) AS vcol_left_cnt, COUNT(vcol_right_marker) AS vcol_right_cnt]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[c, vcol_left_marker, vcol_right_marker]) :- Calc(select=[c, true AS vcol_left_marker, null:BOOLEAN AS vcol_right_marker]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[f, null:BOOLEAN AS vcol_left_marker, true AS vcol_right_marker]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testIntersectLeftIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 WHERE 1=0 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testIntersectRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT SELECT f FROM T2 WHERE 1=0

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testIntersectWithOuterProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM (SELECT a, b FROM T1 INTERSECT SELECT d, e FROM T2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[(((a = d) OR (a IS NULL AND d IS NULL)) AND ((b = e) OR (b IS NULL AND e IS NULL)))], select=[a, b], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) +- Calc(select=[d, e]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testMinus
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 EXCEPT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[IS NOT DISTINCT FROM(c, f)], select=[c], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) : +- Calc(select=[c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f]]) +- Calc(select=[f]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testMinusAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 EXCEPT ALL SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalMinus(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

Calc(select=[c0 AS c]) +- Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$planner$functions$tablefunctions$ReplicateRows$a5a5fb35ffda8b52251be55e3ceaee69($0, $1)], correlate=[table(ReplicateRows(sum_vcol_marker,c))], select=[sum_vcol_marker,c,c0], rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT sum_vcol_marker, VARCHAR(2147483647) c, VARCHAR(2147483647) c0)], joinType=[INNER]) +- Calc(select=[sum_vcol_marker, c], where=[(sum_vcol_marker > 0)]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, SUM(vcol_marker) AS sum_vcol_marker]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[c, vcol_marker]) :- Calc(select=[c, 1:BIGINT AS vcol_marker]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[f, -1:BIGINT AS vcol_marker]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testMinusLeftIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 WHERE 1=0 EXCEPT SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testMinusRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 EXCEPT SELECT f FROM T2 WHERE 1=0

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(f=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- Calc(select=[c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMinusWithNestedTypes
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable EXCEPT SELECT * FROM MyTable

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[(((a = a0) OR (a IS NULL AND a0 IS NULL)) AND ((b = b0) OR (b IS NULL AND b0 IS NULL)) AND ((c = c0) OR (c IS NULL AND c0 IS NULL)))], select=[a, b, c], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]])(reuse_id=[1]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testUnionNullableTypes
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM A UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN c > 0 THEN b ELSE NULL END FROM A

LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CASE(>($2, 0), $1, null:RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER _1, VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" _2))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[CASE((c > 0), b, null:RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER _1, VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" _2)) AS EXPR$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testUnionAnyType
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM A UNION ALL SELECT b FROM A

LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]], fields=[a, b])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[b]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
